steps.description: Move to the far right side of the rock to the right of the bridge.
Jump onto the tikis, then do a swing-jump onto the rock formation. Be sure to wait until the tiki floats upward.
Activate all the buttons by ground pounding on the corners. This allows you to miss the tiki hitbox.
Move behind the barrel building and jump to the muffler building.

techs.name: Tiki Jump
techs.description: Jump onto the tikis, then perform a swing jump to the rock formation. Then follow the rocks and jump over to Gary.

techs.name: Patrick Skip
techs.description: Jump to the second platform straight ahead of the checkpoint, then perform a max distance jump to reach Patrick without fighting those pesky robots!

techs.name: Corner Pound
techs.description: By ground pounding on the corner of the button block, you can activate it while missing the tiki hitbox.
